name: CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Signed contract agreement
DETAIL - A copy of the contract agreement has been reviewed, agreed and signed by both parties
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Approved Contract Management Plan
DETAIL - An approved copy of the contract specific management plan is received and kept on site
FREQUENCY - Once and updated as required
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Full set of FOR CONSTRUCTION Drawings
DETAIL - A full and final set of For Construction drawing is received and entered into project drawing register. Register is updated as required
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Approved Resource Consent
DETAIL - An approved resource consent has been received from the relevant regulatory authority for the construction of the contract works
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - current and up to date electronic design data
DETAIL - A full set of design data files are supplied to allow for set out and machine control models to be created
DETAIL - A set of current and in date insurance certificates are supplied.
DETAIL - An accepted construction program has been supplied showing start and finished dates, duration and critical path for the contract works
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Photograph the site
DETAIL - Photograph the site prior to construction starting
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Provide daily progress reports

DETAIL - Provide daily progress reports showing % complete, weather conditions, photos and descriptions of the work, number of workers on site, type and number of plant items on site, problems encountered and any other relevant data
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Capture all info on DJR's
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Install effective silt and sediment controls
DETAIL - Install silt fencing and water diversion bund as per contract erosion and sediment control plan
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Monitor effectiveness of, and repair damage to silt control measures
DETAIL - Prior to, during and after rain fall exceeding 25mm/day, check silt control measures and monitor effectiveness of the controls. Carry out any repairs/modification as required
DETAIL - Set up security fencing 1.8m high to provide a secure compound to store plant and materials.
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Check existing ground levels and control points
DETAIL - Check existing or install new survey control points. Survey existing ground levels and compare to design levels
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Setout Contract works
DETAIL - Setout key points of the contract works to allow for accurate levels and positions of all elements
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - IF REQUIRED - Build machine control model for the contract works
DETAIL - Build a model of design surfaces that can be utilised with machine control plant (excavator, grader)
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Record all construction works
DETAIL - Pickup all elements as constructed - finished levels, ducting, concrete foundations, fencing etc
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Produce as-built drawing set
DETAIL - Provide a set of as-built drawings and data as required by client
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Site is to be graded so water falls away from compound
DETAIL - Grade surrounding ground level so water flows away from compound
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Test Subgrade CBR
DETAIL - Subgrade must be a minimum CBR value of 3%
○ The subgrade is to be proof rolled and any deflection greater than 25mm should be rectified
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - Contract Drawing - 0460, GGT Hosting Spec Section 1.6
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Geotextile Strength Class
DETAIL - Geotextile must be a minimum of strength class D
DETAIL - Aggregate must be graded as a GAP65
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - MDD and OMC
DETAIL - Lab test to determine the MDD and OMC of the GAP65 Aggregate
DETAIL - Top of GAP65 surface should be 100mm below FL
DETAIL - Compaction testing using a NDM to confirm degree of compaction - Mean 95%, Min 92%
DETAIL - Aggregate must be graded as a AP20
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - MDD and OMC
DETAIL - Lab test to determine the MDD and OMC of the AP20 Aggregate
DETAIL - Top surface should be at FL
DETAIL - Compaction testing using a NDM to confirm degree of compaction - Mean 98%, Min 92%
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Gravel compound size and batter slops
DETAIL - Top surface of compound must extend minimum 500mm past fence location and slope 1:3 to existing ground level
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Trench and ducting routes, Concrete protrusions
DETAIL - The trenching an cable routes are to be marked out on site and checked. Protrusions into concrete slab foundations are to be set out
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Trench to be excavated to required depth
DETAIL - trenches are to be 850mm deep from design FL and 300mm wide
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Power and fibre duct installation depth
DETAIL - Power ducts to be 800mm and fibre ducts to be 600mm minimum below design FL
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Warning tape location
DETAIL - Warning tape is to be 450mm below design FL
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
5.5 - TUDS Pits - Size and lid rating
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Correct size and ratings
DETAIL - Power and fibre pits to be a minimum of 0.59m2 (750x1200) and security pit to be a minimum of 0.45m2 (450x450) and all lids to be class D and bolted down
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Locations are correct
DETAIL - Setout pit locations prior to trenching
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Foundations are to the correct depth and size
DETAIL - Augered holes need to be a depth of 1220mm and a diameter of 460mm
DETAIL - Holes to be backfilled with 25MPa concrete, poles are to be spaced 100mm from the base of the excavation
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Delivery Docket and Lab Testing
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Excavation must be deep and large enough.
DETAIL - Must allow for 300mm of AP40 Basecourse and extend 600mm past face of foundation on all sides
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Geotextile Strength Class
DETAIL - Geotextile must be a minimum of strength class D
DETAIL - Aggregate must be graded as a GAP40
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - MDD and OMC
DETAIL - Lab test to determine the MDD and OMC of the GAP40 Aggregate
DETAIL - AP40 layer below foundation should be a minimum of 300mm thick, extend 600mm  around the foundation of all side and lift 400mm above base of foundation on all sides
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
DETAIL - Compaction testing using a NDM to confirm degree of compaction - Min 98% MDD
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Size and Grade
DETAIL - HD20 (Grade 500) for top and bottom bars, HD10 (Grade 500) for link legs
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Spacing and Cover
DETAIL - 200mm centres for top and bottom bars, and 400mm centres for link legs
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Location for Protrusions
DETAIL - Ducts for KAA Power and Communications must protrude on the left side of bolt 7 and stay between bolts 6&7. Ducts must protrude outside of the 600mm keep out zone.
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
DETAIL - 30MPa Concrete must be used. Concrete cylinder must be tested at 28 days, take 2 cylinders per load delivered
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Test reports, delivery dockets
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - Contract Drawing - 0450, GGT Hosting Spec GGT-1501
DETAIL - Finish surface to be U3, Broom finish with a 25mm chamfer on all exposed edges
DETAIL - Bolts to be numbers 1 to 8 clockwise around foundation. Bolts 1 and 5 must be aligned with long fence azimuth
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
DETAIL - Anchor bolts must be embedded a minimum of 265mm and protrude from the top surface by a minimum of 120mm
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Excavation must be deep and large enough.
DETAIL - Must allow for 300mm of AP40 Basecourse and extend 600mm past face of foundation on all sides
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Geotextile Strength Class
DETAIL - Geotextile must be a minimum of strength class D
DETAIL - Aggregate must be graded as a GAP40
DETAIL - AP40 layer below foundation should be a minimum of 150mm thick and be the same dimensions as the concrete pad
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Size and Grade
DETAIL - HD16 (Grade 500) for top and bottom bars
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Spacing and Cover

DETAIL - 200mm centres for top and bottom bars both ways
75mm cover, top, sides and bottom
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Location for Protrusions
DETAIL - There are 8 duct protrusions detailed in the contract drawings, 3 x power, 3 x fibre, 1 x generator controls and 1 x earth
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
DETAIL - 30MPa Concrete must be used. Concrete cylinder must be tested at 28 days, take 2 cylinders from delivery
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Test reports, delivery dockets
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - Contract Drawing - 0463, GGT Hosting Spec GGT-1501
DETAIL - Finish surface to be U3, Broom finish on all exposed concrete, trowel finish for area under cabinet. There must be a 25mm chamfer on all exposed edges and 1% fall away from concrete of pad.
DETAIL - Aggregate must be graded as a GAP40
DETAIL - AP40 layer below foundation should be a minimum of 150mm thick and be the same dimensions as the concrete pad
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Size and Grade
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Spacing and Cover
DETAIL - Two layers of Mesh for generator pad, single layer for fibre enclosure. 75mm cover from bottom, 50mm cover from top
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Location for Protrusions
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - Contract Drawing - 0460, GGT Hosting Spec GGT-1501
DETAIL - 25MPa Concrete must be used. Concrete cylinder must be tested at 28 days, take 2 cylinders from delivery
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Test reports, delivery dockets
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - Contract Drawing - 0460, GGT Hosting Spec GGT-1501
DETAIL - Finish surface to be U3, Broom finish. There must be a 25mm chamfer on all exposed edges.
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Fence must be in correct location
DETAIL - Fence line will be set out by survey prior to post hole excavation
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Diameter and Depth
DETAIL - All Post Holes are to be 450mm diameter
○ Gate posts, corner posts and the first two posts in from each corner post must be 1.8m deep.
○ All other intermediate posts and timer fence posts must be 1.2m deep
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
DETAIL - Security Fence post holes to be 2.5m apart
○ Acoustic Fence posts to be 1.2m apart
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - GGT Hosting Spec GGT-1501
DETAIL - 25MPa Concrete must be used. Concrete cylinder must be tested at 28 days, take 2 cylinders from each delivery load
CSS/IDS/ASNZS STANDARD - GGT Hosting Spec GGT-1501
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Size and treatment of timber
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA (WHAT'S REQUIRED) - Post and Fence Alignment
DETAIL - Fence posts must be vertical and in a straight line
VERIFICATION RECORDS - Survey Pickup and photos
